items.sentence: Tom lives in the same part of town as Mary does.
Tom could\'ve figured that out without any help.
I\'ll clean up the house before my parents come.
I\'ll get in touch with Tom as soon as possible.
I\'ll get in touch with you as soon as possible.
I almost forgot to tell you about what happened.
Have you ever asked Tom why he doesn\'t do that?
Have you ever been to Chuck\'s Diner for brunch?
I suppose we could ask Tom why Mary isn\'t here.
I suspect Tom and Mary don\'t like me very much.
Is Tom wearing the new shirt you bought for him?
It depends on how much money you have available.
Tom won\'t admit that he\'s done anything wrong.
Tom suddenly realized the attraction was mutual.
Tom said that he wanted me to give this to Mary.
Tom said that he was going camping next weekend.
How could Tom not know that was going to happen?
I thought you said we weren\'t going to do that.
The basketball team doesn\'t practice on Monday.
Do you know anyone who would be able to do that?
